summary: Sam and Jonathan, a pair of hapless novelty salesman, embark on a tour of the human condition in reality and fantasy that unfold in a series of absurdist episodes.
cast: Nils Westblom|Holger Andersson|Per Bergqvist|Charlotta Larsson|Solveig Andersson|Viktor Gyllenberg|Sture Olsson|Lotti Törnros|Jonas Gerholm|Ingvar Olsson|Ola Stensson|Oscar Salomonsson|Roger Olsen Likvern|Linda Birgersson|Arne Hellqvist|Gunnar Bergström|Maia-Lii Kaar|Anette Eklund|Johan Sköld|Tess Dahlström|Thindra Gardeman|Birgitta Rudklint|Wilma Kinnman|Bengt Lyngbäck|Gösta Öhman|Ronn Elfors|Victor A. Victor|Annagreta Berg|Lena Lannebjer|Roger Fogelberg|Louise Nyholm Leskinen|Stuart Holland|Simon Westberg|Amanda Johansson|Folke Mossberg|Sylvia Jahns|Mats Ryden|Wilhelm Rising|Göran Holm
title: Una paloma se posó en una rama a reflexionar sobre la existencia
